sage.event

Class AbstractGameEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.event.AbstractGameEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGameEvent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ShutdownGameEvent

    public abstract class AbstractGameEvent
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGameEvent
    This class acts as the abstract base class from which all concrete game events are derived. It provides functions common to all game events.
    Author:
    Kenneth Barnett, Mike McShaffry
    See Also:
    Game Coding Complete
